user_question: What are the top 5 most dangerous adventure sports and generate an image of someone doing one of them?
final_answer: The top 5 most dangerous adventure sports are: 1) Base Jumping, 2) Big Wave Surfing, 3) Cave Diving, 4) Heli-Skiing, 5) Free Solo Climbing. Image of someone base jumping generated. Cave diving risks include drowning, getting lost, equipment failure, and hypothermia.
